snippet.title: Not For Broadcast: Live & Spooky DLC | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Not For Broadcast DLC, "Live & Spooky", will haunt the network from March 23rd, 2023. 
This is the first DLC for the award-winning FMV game, Not For Broadcast.

You've been assigned to stay late to work on a special episode of the popular ghost-hunting show "Live & Spooky."

The studio was closed after a mysterious death occurred years ago, and nobody has ever found out the truth. Well, nobody alive anyway...

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2199310/Not_For_Broadcast_Live__Spooky

Not For Broadcast Season Pass: 
https://tblink.co/NFB_SP

Not For Broadcast Deluxe Edition on Steam:
https://tblink.co/NFB_DE

Not For Broadcast Deluxe Edition on Xbox:
https://tblink.co/NFB_DEX

Visit the Not For Broadcast website: 
https://www.notforbroadcastgame.com/
